content: introducing a charming crocheted square made from 2 skeins of friends cotton 8/6 yarn from hobbii this textured pattern features a modern floral motif making it a delightful addition to your home in springtime this versatile piece can be used as a dishcloth or transformed into an adorable bunny napkin by adding a head ears and paws additionally it serves as a creative cutlery holder perfect for wrapping up your utensils in various styles elevate your easter dining experience with this functional and whimsical creation materials 2 skeins of friends cotton 8/6 color 117 crochet hook 3 mm d-3 fiberfill embroidery yarn scissors needle tape measure
